College Summary: Sikkim Manipal University is recognised by the University Grants Commission (UGC) and the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE). It was established in 1995 in Gangtok, Sikkim. Sikkim Manipal University (SMU) offers 16 undergraduate, 18 postgraduate, diploma in medical biotechnology, and doctoral courses in all fields. Sikkim Manipal University has divided these courses in the two campuses- Sikkim Manipal Institute of Technology (SMIT) and Sikkim Manipal Institute of Medical Sciences (SMIMS). Sikkim Manipal University course admissions are based on both merit and entrance exams.

College Summary: NIT Sikkim is UGC recognised autonomous university. Established in 2010, NIT Sikkim is ranked 151 in the engineering category by NIRF 2023. NIT Sikkim offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctorate degrees. NIT Sikkim has been accorded the status of an Institution of National Importance by the Government of India and approved by AICTE. The most popular program of NIT Sikkim is BTech CSE. NIT Sikkim offers 8 specialization in the BTech course. Admission to the NIT Sikkim BTech course is done on the basis of JEE Mains rank. The admission procedure is then followed by a counselling procedure. The overall cutoff for JEE-Main 2023 is 162246 - 475866 rank for general category. Check: NIT Sikkim Admission

College Summary: Vinayaka Missions Sikkim University (VMSU)  was set up in the year 2008, and it is approved by UGC. The latest achievement of the college includes the “Teaching Excellence Award.” This university is primarily famous for Management Studies, Humanities, and Science. It provides both the mode of education facilities direct education and distance education. The university offers undergraduate, postgraduate, doctorate, and diplomas courses across four streams. Some of the popular courses are BA, B.Com, MBA, B.Sc.The admission in this college strictly depends upon the merit of the students. Application to the college can be filled online as well as offline mode.

College Summary: Shri Ramasamy Memorial University - [SRM], Sikkim at Gangtok is a private university established in the year 2013. The university was established under Shri Ramasamy Memorial University, Sikkim Act 2013. It is affiliated by UGC and NAAC-B. It is also placed in the A category by the Ministry of Human Resource Development.

College Summary: Nar Bahadur Bhandari Degree College, previously known as Sikkim Government College was founded in the year 1977. It is governed by the Directorate of Higher Education, HRDD, Govt. of Sikkim and is affiliated to Sikkim University. The college offers 19 UG programs and 5 PG programs to satisfy the need for quality education in Sikkim. Admission to the programs takes place following an administered and transparent process. Its campus is spread over 22 acres with well-organized classrooms, labs, computers to create a conducive academic environment.

College Summary: Sikkim University is a central university located in Gangtok. Established in 2007, the university is recognised by the UGC and ranked 151 among top 2000 universities in NIRF 2023 rankings. The permanent campus of Sikkim University is built at Yangang in Namchi district, about 56 km from Gangtok.

College Summary: Institute of Hotel Management (IHM), Gangtok was established in the year 1990 as a food craft institute. It was upgraded into the Institute of Hotel Management during the year 2000 and got affiliated to NCHMCT under the Ministry of Tourism, Govt. of India. The institute offers B.Sc. in Hospitality and Hotel Administration, Diploma and Certificate courses. All the programs are well-structured and taught under the guidance of qualified faculties. The degree or Diploma holders get employment in the most reputed hotels in the country and abroad.

College Name: Directorate of Distance Education Sikkim Manipal University - [SMU-DE], East Sikkim
College Summary: Sikkim Manipal University Distance Education [SMU-DE] has been awarded as the “Best University in Distance Learning” by ASSOCHAM India. It has also won Silver Award in Digital Learning Transformation Category in 2018. The university offers total 6 undergraduate and postgraduate level courses in Management and Information Technology in distance mode. SMUDE has a vibrant alumni community with over 5 lakh alumni members. Check out other top distance MBA colleges and courses in India

College Summary: Sikkim University is presently located in Gangtok, the capital town of Sikkim. The permanent campus measuring 300 acres is coming up at Yangang which is about 56 kms away from Gangtok in South Sikkim. The nearest airport is Bagdogra and railway station is New Jalpaiguri.
